metadata.dc:author: Gianpaolo, B
Viñas Salas, J
Canales Reina, J
Iglesias Martínez, E
Casals Garrido, R
Reñé Espinet, J
Pérez Ruiz, L
de Frutos Rincón, J L
metadata.dc:description: A very rare case of double fistula aorto-enteric jejunal and ileal, draining to an aortic pseudoaneurysm, is presented. There were not evidence of sepsis, and by this reason pseudoaneurysm and prosthesis were removed, a new prosthesis was inserted by reconstruction "in situ", and intestinal fistulas were closed. The short- and large-term postoperatory was satisfactory. A review about possible mechanisms implicated in a fistula, diagnosis and therapeutic alternatives was made.
metadata.dc:title: Doble fístula aorto-entérica secundaria a pseudoaneurisma aórtico. Corrección anatómica.
[A double aorto-enteric fistula secondary to an aortic pseudoaneurysm. Its anatomical correction].
